Name: Blackshift
About the game: Explore the world to find all 100 levels, and solve the puzzles within. Find hidden crystals and exchange them for items to help you on your way. Blackshift has A sense of mystery 100 levels, plus hundreds of user-made levels Secrets, bonuses and unlockables Smooth, fast gameplay Blackshift does not have Hand-holding. You're a smart person. You'll be fine. A story or any human characters Trenchant social commentary Enter the Level Pit Make your own levels, watch other people play them, and compete for the best time.
